Vehement:


KitKat, hmmm...he thought.
"Very well, we shall meet in person."
 

Vehement left the bridge, followed by his two men.  They stopped short of the 
main access hatch, taking hiding positions with weapons ready.  Vehement 
walked outside of the ship.  He walked up to Destructor.  "I am Vehement.  I 
take it you are Destructor?"
